definitions.definition: Seemingly or apparently valid, likely, or acceptable ; conceivably true or likely.
Obtaining approbation ; specifically pleasing ; apparently right ; specious .
examples: a plausible pretext; plausible manners; a plausible delusion

definitions.definition: Worthy of being applauded ; praiseworthy ; commendable ; ready .

main_definition: Seemingly or apparently valid, likely, or acceptable ; conceivably true or likely.
secondary_definitions: Obtaining approbation ; specifically pleasing ; apparently right ; specious .
( obsolete ) Worthy of being applauded ; praiseworthy ; commendable ; ready .
